Author: BipolarSkeleton
Text: I can wear a small I just can’t wrap my head around that fact and just buy a large just in case   Same with my pants I buy pants way to large but that doesn’t matter as I’m in a wheelchair so I sit all the time anyways

Author: starvingthearies
Text: I have the same problem with BDD. I'll sometimes see myself in the mirror and think I look okay and then I see myself in a picture and I just go oh fuck no
